com.novar.business

Class Have

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.novar.business.Have
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HaveJdbc

    public abstract class Have
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is an abstract class used to make a Have Have is the link between the classes Accessory and Room.
    Author:
    GUILMET Romain
